CustomField.description: When checked, the system will not the consider the line in inventory calculations. Adjustment lines are the only type of lines that can be added to sales orders w/o payments that have posted.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When checked, the system will not the consider the line in inventory calculations. Adjustment lines are the only type of lines that can be added to sales orders w/o payments that have posted.
CustomField.label: Is Adjustment
